title: ALTPERP - ALT season ready? Possible short term gains regardless
name: greendubs
contents: With October CPI announcing in 3.5 hours, we may see a decent little pump (15%) on ALTPERP if CPI comes in at 8.1% or less. This may possible be followed by the kick off of ALT season if BTC and other external factors play nice. It has found some support on the .786 with history of support. This idea lacks confidence, given the global economic situation and wide range of influencing variables/factors on the ALT market.

title: BTC waiting time no trade zone
name: giorgiovie
contents:
BTC brooke down a small simmetric triangle but is already back up at the old Support Line, it is over DO but under MO that stand at 19450 , down we have S1 at 18800, so BTC is just floating at the 19000 mark, really on the upper side there is not real resistance until 19450; my position is neutral i do not see any sign or formation that may indicating a move up or down so i just stay out from a trade ; RSI 15M is neutral, 30M is pointing up from oversold, 1H is pointing dowm versus oversold area and 4h is going to overbought area so that information is telling me that we may move either up either down , I still favour a move down than up but i am not going to trade it at the moment i will wait for BTC next move from outisde; i will monitor if a bounce up at 19500 or a pullback to 18800 will happened and than eventually decide from there

title: SPX500 is trying to find a bottom - UPDATE - 13 October 2022
name: Trinnisia_Trades
contents:
All eyes on CPI at 1.30pm (BST)
VIX is 33 in the moment of writing this, and most of the markets don't move a lot.
I've been seeing a lot of totally different approaches to the market: some are extremely bullish , some bearish .
I still expect a short term recovery in upcoming two weeks - I opened buy position on SPX500 with TP of 3700 - not to bee too greedy.


*You can follow me now on Patreon - Trinnisia Trades, where I will be posting my thoughts and strategies. No charges till end of October 2022*

title: Pound Yen is about to take off to 166.426
name: Doji-2k1
contents:
Hey trader. I hope you having a fantastic week!

The price is currently running in the double bottoms 2nd leg formation and above the 50 and bullish crossed short-term MA's. We're expecting an uptrend to the double bottoms neckline for the accumulation phase formation. The price will react to that anticipation once it has bearish retested the Daily Half a Bat Neckline, 50 and 8 MA with a bullish candle formation or close. But if the price bearish breaks and closes below those key levels, the uptrend will be rejected, then a drop to the Mini Monthly Neckline may occur.

That's it for today. I hope you found value in this article. If you have a different concept in mind, feel free to share it in the comments section (below), I'd love to know your thoughts!

Stay Blessed Baby,
Sphatrades.

title: NDX Potential for Bearish Momentum | 13th October 2022
name: desmondlzw
contents:
On the H4 chart, the overall bias for NDX is bearish . To add confluence to this, the price is below the Ichimoku cloud , indicating a bearish market.
Looking for a retracement sell entry at 11439.38 where the 23.6% Fibonacci line and -27.2% Fibonacci expansion line is located. Stop loss will be set at 12062.52, slightly above the 38.2% Fibonacci line. Take profit will be at 10408.41 where the 78.6% Fibonacci projection line and 127.2% Fibonacci extension line are located.

title: Daily review of BNB interval 1H
name: cryptodailyuk
contents:
Hello everyone, let's take a look at the BNB to USDT chart over the 1 hour timeframe. As you can see, the price is moving below the local uptrend line.

Let's start with the designation of the support line and as you can see the first support in the near future is $ 270.5, if the support breaks down, the next support is $ 269.9 and $ 269.6.

Now let's move to the resistance line as you can see the first resistance is $ 271.1, if you can break it the next resistance will be $ 271.6 and $ 272.

Looking at the CHOP indicator , we can see that in the 1-hour interval we have a lot of energy, and the MACD indicator shows a local upward trend.

contents:
i am waiting to trade on a good breakout, on the 1st week of November.
Naukri , is a good stock.
PLEASE do have a good look at the colours.

1. the two dark black lines are the actual target what i am aiming for.
2. the dark purple line is the resistance which is tested multiple times.
3. minor blue lines are the levels, where one should look at buying for dips, or buying for averaging out(if stock is in short run).

MOVING AVERAGES ARE JUST FOR REFERENCES, FOR A SMALL LOOK AT IT! ITS NOT SAYING MUCH
FIBONNACI RETRACEMENT LEVEL OF 0.618, GREAT SUPPORT TO BUY.

title: 🔥INSANE IMPORTANT BITCOIN IDEA 🔥
name: Rocksorgate
contents:
⚡️Alright so this idea is important in the least to say, if you'd like to read the idea below I think it'd be very beneficial to learn from. A few days ago I gave you guys this idea post and in it I gave a possible outcome from a past price action noting that the fall could extend further. If you want to see that it's the next chart Idea below it:



⚡️That's the past price action of what I proposed could happen and now here's our current chart:


⚡️It's proven pretty well to look at past price action and if that's anything to tell then we can either be looking at a bottom with Bitcoin gearing up to push up again or another EMA loss by which we simply go down again. I've added a real quick and new marking at $19,696 but we haven't hit our old marking of $18,690 which is like that last wall of support for bulls should we progress down to that level so mark that.

⚡️If you wanna keep tuned simply keep in tune with the markings as your always more than welcome to mark them yourselves or come back to this idea whenever and hit that play button which does a lot more than you may think. Can go to any of my past ideas and hit play and it'll show wonders I guarantee. I simply do what I can and learn from each and every single idea but looking like we may bounce from here if we enter and hold that 200 EMA to form a new mountain entry else we'll slip and fall further down possibly till the next support. Here's a quick chart look of our EMA's.

⚡️I try to keep these ideas concise and explain/make sense of price action and the markets the best I can but I know it may not always be the easiest sometimes so bear with me on that, I'm learning and getting better at that with each idea but basically I give what I can to these charts and I simply learn with each new mark and move that happens. This is a long journey we're on but it's one well worth it. If you'd like to leave a like or follow it'd be much appreciated of course and have a great day. Thank you.

~ Rock '

title: AMZN Potential for Bearish Continuation| 13th October 2022
name: desmondlzw
contents:
On H4, with the price moving below ichimoku cloud and descending trendline, we have a bearish bias that the price may drop from the sell entry at 116.81, which is in line with the overlap resistance to the take profit at 101.28, where the 78.6% fibonacci projection and 61.8% fibonacci projection are. Alternatively, price may rise to the stop loss at 122.35, where the previous swing high is.
